import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' function SearchBar() { const navigate = useNavigate() const [keyword, setKeyword] = useState('') const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() if(keyword) { navigate(`/?keywordq=${keyword}`); } } return ( <>
setKeyword(e.target.value)} className="form-control" aria-label="Text input with dropdown button" />
  • Action
  • Another action
  • Something else here
  • Separated link
); } export default SearchBar
